mapper.select: SELECT b_sano, b_no, b_id, b_title, dbday, b_hit, b_delete, num FROM(SELECT b_sano, b_no, b_id, b_title, TO_char(b_date,'YYYY-MM-DD')as dbday, b_hit, b_delete, rownum as num FROM(SELECT b_sano, b_no, b_id, b_title, b_date, b_hit, b_delete FROM p_board WHERE b_sano=4 ORDER BY b_no DESC)) WHERE b_delete='n' AND b_sano=4 AND num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT a.b_no, a.b_id, a.b_title, a.b_content, a.b_sano, a.b_delete, b.sa_img, dbday, a.b_hit, num FROM(SELECT b_no, b_id, b_title, b_content, To_char(b_date,'YYYY-MM-DD')as dbday ,b_hit, b_sano, b_delete, rownum as num FROM (SELECT b_no, b_id, b_title, b_content,b_date, b_hit, b_sano, b_delete FROM p_board WHERE b_delete = 'n' AND b_sano not in(4) ORDER BY b_no desc)) a JOIN b_word b ON a.b_sano = b.sa_no WHERE num BETWEEN 1 AND 5
